type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Change Hits on Target

---


[Bi-entity Action Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_action_types/change_hits_on_target).

Changes the value which the [Hits On Target](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_action_types/change_hits_on_target) bi-entity condition checks for.

Type ID: `apugli:change_hits_on_target`

!!! note
    This only effects the [Hits On Target](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_action_types/change_hits_on_target) condition, this does not mess with any base Minecraft stuff involving damage source tracking.

---

### Example
```json
"bientity_action": {
    "type": "apugli:change_hits_on_target",
    "change": 0,
    "operation": "set"
}
```
This example sets the amount of times that the actor has hit the target to 0.
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Change Hits on Target

---


[Bi-entity Action Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_action_types/change_hits_on_target).

Changes the value which the [Hits On Target](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_action_types/change_hits_on_target) bi-entity condition checks for.

Type ID: `apugli:change_hits_on_target`

!!! note
    This only effects the [Hits On Target](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_action_types/change_hits_on_target) condition, this does not mess with any base Minecraft stuff involving damage source tracking.

---

### Example
```json
"bientity_action": {
    "type": "apugli:change_hits_on_target",
    "change": 0,
    "operation": "set"
}
```
This example sets the amount of times that the actor has hit the target to 0.

change.description: This value will be either added to or set as the hits on target check.
change.markdownDescription: This value will be either added to or set as the hits on target check.

operation.description: Determines if the action should add or set the value of the hits on target check. Accepts `"add"` or `"set"`.
operation.markdownDescription: Determines if the action should add or set the value of the hits on target check. Accepts `"add"` or `"set"`.

timer_change.description: This value will be either added to or set as the hits on target check's timer. This will be reset to 0 if it goes above the Apugli config's `resetTimerTicks` value (default 100).
timer_change.markdownDescription: This value will be either added to or set as the hits on target check's timer. This will be reset to 0 if it goes above the Apugli config's `resetTimerTicks` value (default 100).

timer_operation.description: Determines if the action should add or set the value of the timer relating to hits on target. Accepts `"add"` or `"set"`.
timer_operation.markdownDescription: Determines if the action should add or set the value of the timer relating to hits on target. Accepts `"add"` or `"set"`.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Change Hits on Target (Bi-entity Action Type) date: 2021-06-20

Change Hits on Target

Bi-entity Action Type.

Changes the value which the Hits On Target bi-entity condition checks for.

Type ID: apugli:change_hits_on_target

!!! note This only effects the Hits On Target condition, this does not mess with any base Minecraft stuff involving damage source tracking.

Fields

Field Type Default Description
change Integer optional This value will be either added to or set as the hits on target check.
operation String "add" Determines if the action should add or set the value of the hits on target check. Accepts "add" or "set".
timer_change Integer optional This value will be either added to or set as the hits on target check's timer. This will be reset to 0 if it goes above the Apugli config's resetTimerTicks value (default 100).
timer_operation String "add" Determines if the action should add or set the value of the timer relating to hits on target. Accepts "add" or "set".

Example

"bientity_action": {
    "type": "apugli:change_hits_on_target",
    "change": 0,
    "operation": "set"
}

This example sets the amount of times that the actor has hit the target to 0.
